oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Deed/Court Pleading
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Mary E. (Mollie) Russell from Meigs County, Tennessee was born September 1842. Mollie hand copied songs into her own personal song book (rhea055). Found within the song book was this Chancery Court pleading in the case of Thomas J. Balland, et al versus F. A. Balland, et al over the estate of Washington Balland, deceased in Roane County, Tennessee. The case was filed in May 1865. Written on the back of the last page is a deed from 1874 for 4 tracts conveyed to Joseph Wilson in Roane County, Tenn.
